text:
@GavinNewsom forget$$$$onUselessTracking As big citiesNationwide experienced MassiveProtestsOf people& police packed together Many with NO masks.Maybe we cud put the money to better use fixing corruption in DA and police depts/jails instead.
#GeorgeFloydMurder #GeorgeFloydprotest #Covid19
